unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success,`` the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years.'' It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat, Wise added. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google Inc. 's CEO by co-founder Larry Page. Both men, along with Google Inc. 's other co-founder Sergey Brin , have limited their salaries to$ 1 for years.

Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so,'' David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. -- Editors: Eddie Buckle, Anthony Aarons.
